name: Thumb War (Madeline Dupre)
description:
This is my submission for Weekly Game Jam  - Week 184 - Thumb War.  :-)

Controls : 

Left Hand 

  • W/S  - move up + down
  • A/D - rotate 
  • E - shoot 

Right Hand

  • Up and Down Arrows - move up + down
  • Left and Right Arrows - rotate
  • / - shoot  

Tip: if thumb bullets touch each other they're both destroyed!
